get.description: Retrieves a json with a list of entities based on their CIDOC CRM class code. The json contains a **result** and **pagination** key. All in OpenAtlas available codes can be found under `https://redmine.craws.net/projects/uni/wiki/OpenAtlas_and_CIDOC_CRM_class_mapping`. The result can also be filtered, ordered and manipulated through different parameters. By default results are orderd alphabetically and 20 entities are shown.

parameters.name: class_code
parameters.description: Need to be a valid CIDOC CRM class code (e.g. E21, E18, E33)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of entities returned per page

parameters.name: column
parameters.description: The result will be sorted by the given column

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Result will be sorted asc/desc (default column is name)

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Specify request with custom SQL filter method.

parameters.name: first
parameters.description: List of results start with given ID

parameters.name: last
parameters.description: List of results start with entity after given ID

parameters.name: show
parameters.description: Select which key should be shown. If 'not' is used, no other keys will be shown

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Returns a number which represents the total count of the result

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: Triggers the file download of the given request

200.description: A json with a list of results and pagination information

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.
